footer.consultation: Do you need advice or have questions?

main.aboutText: WoodLuck workshop is not just a business, it is a social business. We create comfortable, atmospheric furniture that corresponds to individual style, attracting people to work from vulnerable population groups. We create together, take responsibility, help together, we believe in people.
main.bannerText: We direct 10% of the profit to families in need. The WoodLuck workshop was founded as a social enterprise, so our social component is part of our DNA.

statistic.2: Our clients turn to us with new promises.
statistic.3: Clients come to us for recommendations

mission.title: OUR MISSION AND VALUES
mission.text: We create comfortable, atmospheric furniture that reflects an individual style, making people from different population groups work.

paragraf1.title: Create together
paragraf1.text: We have a blessed team, as we work together with the client, we appreciate our contribution to the final product

paragraf2.title: We take responsibility
paragraf2.text: Responsibility to oneself, the client and society

paragraf3.title: We help together
paragraf3.text: We give part of our resources (profit, time, products) to the development of communities

paragraf4.title: Environmental friendliness and safety
paragraf4.text: We use only safe varnish and glue that does not contain harmful chemicals

story.text1: WoodLuck Workshop was founded as a social enterprise, so our social component is part of our DNA. We direct 10% of the profit to families in need.
story.text2: Since the very beginning of the workshop, we have employed men who have undergone rehabilitation from alcohol and drug addiction in rehabilitation centers in Lviv, as well as those who have returned from ATO

banner2.text1: We financially and materially support the Ukrainian educational platform "Good Neighbor" social program.
banner2.text2: The program is aimed at helping families in a difficult situation, as well as at activating communities at the micro level.

banner3.text1: To support the program, we transfer 10% of the workshop's net income.

banner1.text1: We use only safe varnish and glue that does not contain harmful chemicals.
banner1.text2: Our furniture will serve you faithfully, loyally and for a long time
banner1.text3: Our designers will prepare a model of the future product and advise on materials.

connectBlock.text: Do you have an idea for a design project? Fill out the form and we will contact you!

description.title: PROJECT DESCRIPTION
description.text: Together with the customer, we managed to create a cozy atmospheric space where people like to spend time. Wooden birch paneling on the walls with colored geometric patterns added charm and recognizability to the interior of the institution.

blumPage.totalInfo: At the exit, the customer received a stylish and recognizable interior of the cafe

loftPage.title: LOFT OFFICE G5 ENTERTAINMENT

description.title: PROJECT DESCRIPTION
description.text: G5 came to WoodLuck with their project and design. They had a clear idea of how to organize the office, thought through everything to the smallest detail: zoning, light, etc. So we made all the furniture according to the customer's drawings. The idea of their space was to preserve primacy, so they chose classic loft style: the metal was not covered with powder paint (only varnish, so as not to rust), all metal welding is open, the seams are not hidden. It turned out very cool!

materials.title: Used materials
materials.material2: wooden parts made of pine are covered with varnish

loftPage.totalInfo: At the end, the customer received ease of care and 100% implementation of his request

hostelPage.title: FRIENDS HOSTEL LVIV

description.title: PROJECT DESCRIPTION
description.text: The WoodLuck team developed the design of beds according to the individual dimensions of the customer. The biggest problem of the hostel is its openness and lack of its own space. We have solved this problem: each bed has a curtain that can be closed and have their own light and personal space. There are drawers under each bed, which are closed with a key, you can put a suitcase, a backpack, etc. there.

materials.title: Used materials
materials.material1: solid beech, metal flakes covered with white powder paint, impact-resistant and scratch-resistant

hostelPage.totalInfo: At the exit, the customer has removed a hand-held bed with individual boxes and optimally organized space

projectorPage.title: PROJECTOR LVIV AND HAPPY DESIGN STUDIO

description.title: PROJECT DESCRIPTION
description.text: Work zones are located on two surfaces: on the first one there is a great open space and the main audience, class Projector, coworking, meeting room, skype room and kitchen. On the other hand, the HAPPY team is working. The space can be conveniently called an office for an eloquent roamer. Tenisny steel, guitars, bicycle - everything is as far as possible from the typical office atmosphere. The design studio developed self-made cars, the WoodLuck team implemented their furniture design ideas.

banner.title: What did WoodLuck do?
banner.text7: bar racks for the kitchen, kitchen tables

materials.title: Used materials
materials.material1: solid beech, metal flakes covered with white powder paint, impact-resistant and scratch-resistant

projectorPage.totalInfo: At the end, the customer received the implementation of an individual design and mobile furniture-transformers

gridPage.title: OFFICE FOR 100 WORKPLACES FOR GRID DYNAMICS

description.title: PROJECT DESCRIPTION
description.text: The customer asked for desks that were slightly longer and wider than standard office sizes. We designed them so that when workers are sitting next to each other, they do not disturb each other, so each workstation is separated by a side cabinet that has a lock, so it is safe to store your personal valuables. The table is 2 cm higher than the standard size, so that employees slouch less while working at the computer.

banner.title: What did WoodLuck do?
banner.text7: bar racks for the kitchen, kitchen tables

materials.title: Used materials
materials.material1: metal profile 25x25, black matte powder paint
materials.material2: 18 mm beech covered with water-based ecolac
materials.material3: Chipboard under concrete at the reception and kitchen surfaces

gridPage.totalInfo: At the exit, the customer received a unique design from Wood Luck. Custom-sized desks let in a lot of daylight thanks to an exclusive design

britishPage.title: OFFICE OF THE BRITISH PUSH GAMING COMPANY IN LVIV

description.title: PROJECT DESCRIPTION
description.text: Together with the customer, we managed to create a cozy atmospheric space where people like to spend time. Wooden birch paneling on the walls with colored geometric patterns added charm and recognizability to the interior of the institution.

materials.title: Used materials
materials.material1: metal profile 40x20, powder paint in white and matte colors
materials.material3: 27 mm beech, covered with water-based ecolac
materials.material5: work table: metal profile 80x80, matt black color, beech veneer

britishPage.totalInfo: On the way out, the deputy manager took off the functional office, which allows him to be mobile for working in a team. Simplicity and vishukanist in working space
